20500.title: Sea of Sand
20500.description:
In all directions, as far as you can sense, all you see is sand. It
is aptly named the Sea of Sand since the winds shift and churns the
sands into almost peaceful patterns. If it were not for the
oppressive heat that seems to suck the very life from your body the
constant motion of the sands might very well be soothing. Half
buried in the sand, nearly covered over by time, is the end of a
white stone.

east.description: Lost in the Sea of Sand..

west.description: Lost in the Sea of Sand..

extras.description:
As you peer closer at the stone you see the following engraved
into it.
This area is protected by DarkMists and its pantheon.
Permission to use this area must be gained from Xyza,
Aityhrein, or Tiltan. Thank you and enjoy the area.

north.description: Lost in the Sea of Sand.

east.description: Lost in the Sea of Sand.

20545.title: A Break in the Sea of Sands
20545.description:
Finally! You have managed to see something in this vast wasteland
of sand. Off to the west, through the shimmering heat of the sand,
you see something other than sand. But whatever it is, it is too
far away to be identifiable. But whatever it is, it is something
you can focus on and use as a marker in this endless sea of sand.

east.description: Lost in the Sea of Sand.

west.description: Is that a mirage you see in this direction?

20546.title: A Break in the Sea of Sands
20546.description:
The closer you travel toward the west, the clearer your objective
becomes. Even through the blistering shimmering heat of the desert
you can see what it was that caught you attention. It appears to
be an oasis. But is it a mirage or is it real?

east.description: Lost in the Sea of Sand.

west.description: Is that a mirage you see in this direction?

20547.title: Edge of the Oasis
20547.description:
Your senses do not deceive you, it is in fact an oasis that you saw
so long ago. Date and fig trees surrounded by copious amounts of
hardy grass and scrub brushes fill the oasis. You stand at the outer
most fringes of the Oasis where the sand continually tries to bury
the foliage but to no avail. To the west the side of a medium sized
tent blocks your view. Even from this distance you can hear the
sound of animals and..people?

south.description: Edge of the Oasis.

20548.title: Edge of the Oasis
20548.description:

so long ago. Date and fig trees surrounded by copious amounts of

the foliage but to no avail. Even from this distance you can hear
the sound of animals and..people?

north.description: Edge of the Oasis.

east.description: Lost in the Sea of Sand.

south.description: Edge of the Oasis.

west.description: Into the cool shade of the Oasis.

20549.title: Edge of the Oasis
20549.description:

20550.title: Edge of the Oasis
20550.description:
Your senses do not deceive you, it is in fact an oasis that you saw
so long ago. Date and fig trees surrounded by copious amounts of
hearty grass and scrub brushes fill the oasis. You stand at the outer
most fringes of the Oasis where the sand continually tries to bury
the foliage but to no avail. To the south the side of a medium sized
tent blocks your view. Even from this distance you can hear the
sound of animals and..people?

west.description: Into the cool shade of the Oasis.

20551.title: Within a Tent
20551.description:
Out from under the harsh glare of the sun, this tent feels cool and
comfortable. All about you there boxes and crates, vases the size of
halflings, and coffers overflowing with ungents and spices. It's a
merchants dream having so many rare commodities under one roof. The
air is stuffy in this tent; a mixture of sweat, dust, and a myriad of
spices and scents the likes you can not put your finger on.

south.description: Into the Oasis.

20552.title: On a Path in the Oasis
20552.description:
You stand within the oasis with life flourishing all around. Dates and
figs hang ripe from the trees while colorful birds chirp away on the
branches. Ferns, scrub brushes, and hearty tall grass is all around you.
Evidence of humanity is everywhere. Clothes dripping from makeshift
clothing lines while baskets of woven hemp scattered here and there
filled with all manners of items. Sounds of people laughing and shouting
can be heard coming from the west. To the west you see the source of
incredible life saving oasis, a huge placid pond. To the north and south
there are openings leading into the cool shade of medium sized tents.

north.description: Into the cool shade of the tent.

east.description: Edge of the Oasis.

south.description: Into the cool shade of the tent.

west.description: Into the cool shade of the Oasis.

20553.title: Within a Tent

20555.title: Edge of the Oasis
20555.description:
Your senses do not deceive you, it is in fact an oasis that you saw
so long ago. Date and fig trees surrounded by copious amounts of
hardy grass and scrub brushes fill the oasis. You stand at the outer
most fringes of the Oasis where the sand continually tries to bury
the foliage but to no avail. Even from this distance you can hear
the sound of animals and..people? To the west an enormous pavilion
rises out of the sands.

south.description: Into the cool shade of the Oasis.

west.description: A strange aura seems to surround the pavilion in this direction.

20556.title: Within the Oasis
20556.description:
You stand within the oasis with life flourishing all around. Dates and
figs hang ripe from the trees while colorful birds chirp away on the
branches. Ferns, scrub brushes, and hearty tall grass is all around you.
Evidence of humanity is everywhere. Clothes dripping from makeshift
clothing lines while baskets of woven hemp scattered here and there
filled with all manners of items. Sounds of people laughing and shouting
can be heard coming from the south and west.

north.description: Edge of the Oasis.

east.description: Into the cool shade of the Oasis.

south.description: Into the cool shade of the Oasis.

west.description: Into the cool shade of the Oasis.

20557.title: Within the Oasis
20557.description:
You stand within the oasis with life flourishing all around. Dates and
figs hang ripe from the trees while colorful birds chirp away on the
branches. Ferns, scrub brushes, and hearty tall grass is all around you.
Evidence of humanity is everywhere. Clothes dripping from makeshift
clothing lines while baskets of woven hemp scattered here and there
filled with all manners of items. Sounds of people laughing and shouting
can be heard coming from all around. To the east and west the sides of
medium sized tents blocks your view. From here you can easily see the
source of this oasis's life, a large pond of crystal clear water.

north.description: In the cool shade of the Oasis.

south.description: In the cool shade of the Oasis.

20558.title: In the Center of the Oasis
20558.description:
You stand in the center of the oasis. A large clear pond lies here in
stark contrast to the blistering heat and sand that surrounds the oasis.
Dates and figs hang ripe from the trees as they hang over the pond,
protecting it from the harsh desert sun. Tropical birds chirp away as
they dive into the water to grab a quick drink. Evidence of humanity is
everywhere. Clothes dripping from makeshift clothing lines while baskets
of woven hemp scattered here and there filled with all manners of items.
Sounds of people laughing and shouting can be heard coming from all around.

north.description: In the cool shade of the Oasis.

east.description: In the cool shade of the Oasis.

south.description: In the cool shade of the Oasis.

west.description: In the cool shade of the Oasis.

west.description: Into the cool shade of the Oasis.

20562.title: Edge of the Oasis
20562.description:
Your senses do not deceive you, it is in fact an oasis that you saw
so long ago. Date and fig trees surrounded by copious amounts of
hardy grass and scrub brushes fill the oasis. You stand at the outer
most fringes of the Oasis where the sand continually tries to bury
the foliage but to no avail. To the south the side of a medium sized
tent blocks your view. Even from this distance you can hear the
sound of animals and..people? To the north you see an enormous
pavilion rising up out of the sands.

east.description: Into the cool shade of the Oasis.

20563.title: Within a Tent
20563.description:
Out from under the harsh glare of the sun, this tent feels cool and
comfortable. All about you there boxes and crates, vases the size of
halflings, and coffers overflowing with ungents and spices. It's a
merchants dream having so many rare commodities under one roof. The
air is stuffy in this tent; a mixture of sweat, dust, and a myriad of
spices and scents the likes you can not put your finger on.

south.description: To a worn path in the Oasis.

20564.title: On a Path in the Oasis
20564.description:
You stand within the oasis with life flourishing all around. Dates and
figs hang ripe from the trees while colorful birds chirp away on the
branches. Ferns, scrub brushes, and hearty tall grass is all around you.
Evidence of humanity is everywhere. Clothes dripping from makeshift
clothing lines while baskets of woven hemp scattered here and there
filled with all manners of items. Sounds of people laughing and shouting
can be heard coming from the west. To the west you see the source of
incredible life saving oasis, a huge placid pond. To the north and south
there are openings leading into the cool shade of medium sized tents.

north.description: Into the cool shade of the tent.

east.description: Into the cool shade of the Oasis.

south.description: Into the cool shade of the tent.

west.description: To a worn path in the Oasis.

north.description: Edge of the Oasis.

20570.title: A Break in the Sea of Sands
20570.description:
The closer you travel toward the east, the clearer your objective
becomes. Even through the blistering shimmering heat of the desert
you can see what it was that caught you attention. It appears to
be an oasis. But is it a mirage or is it real?

east.description: Is that a mirage you see in this direction?

west.description: Lost in the Sea of Sand.

20571.title: A Break in the Sea of Sands
20571.description:
The closer you travel toward the east, the clearer your objective
becomes. Even through the blistering shimmering heat of the desert
you can see what it was that caught you attention. It appears to
be an oasis. But is it a mirage or is it real?

east.description: Is that a mirage you see in this direction?

west.description: Lost in the Sea of Sand.

20572.title: A Break in the Sea of Sands
20572.description:
Finally! You have managed to see something in this vast wasteland
of sand. Off to the east, through the shimmering heat of the sand,
you see something other than sand. But whatever it is, it is too
far away to be identifiable. But whatever it is, it is something
you can focus on and use as a marker in this endless sea of sand.

east.description: Is that a mirage you see in this direction?

west.description: Lost in the Sea of Sand.

20573.title: Sea of Sand
20573.description:
In all directions, as far as you can sense, all you see is sand. It
is aptly named the Sea of Sand since the winds shift and churns the
sands into almost peaceful patterns. If it were not for the
oppressive heat that seems to suck the very life from your body the
constant motion of the sands might very well be soothing. The endless
sand is broken by a white stone that appears quite out of place here.

north.description: Lost in the Sea of Sand.

east.description: Lost in the Sea of Sand.

west.description: Lost in the Sea of Sand.

extras.description:
This stone is about as large as a fully grown halfling and is painted
all white. In the center of the stone is the picture of a crudely
painted pig.

20599.title: Sea of Sand
20599.description:
In all directions, as far as you can sense, all you see is sand. It
is aptly named the Sea of Sand since the winds shift and churns the
sands into almost peaceful patterns. If it were not for the
oppressive heat that seems to suck the very life from your body the
constant motion of the sands might very well be soothing. Half
buried in the sand, nearly covered over by time, is the end of a
white stone.

east.description: Lost in the Sea of Sand.

west.description: The Sands of Sorrow can be seen in this direction.

extras.description:
As you peer closer at the stone you see the following engraved
into it.
This area is protected by DarkMists and its pantheon.
Permission to use this area must be gained from Xyza,
Aityhrein, or Tiltan. Thank you and enjoy the area.
